title: Taxi Driver: Slate Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and John Swansburg discuss the 2011 re-release of Taxi Driver. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
